ns2:test-suite.name: A registered user can pay by available Payment methods
ns2:test-suite.title: A registered user can pay by available Payment methods

test-case.name: User can make payment by cash
test-case.title: User can make payment by cash

label.name: feature
label.value: A registered user can pay by available Payment methods

step.name: user navigates to Make Payments page an selects payment method "Cash"
step.title: user navigates to Make Payments page an selects payment method "Cash"

step.name: user pays with amount "84" and enters receipt number to submit
step.title: user pays with amount "84" and enters receipt number to submit

step.name: cash payment is successful with message "You have successfully completed your CASH payment!"
step.title: cash payment is successful with message "You have successfully completed your CASH payment!"

failure.message: unknown error: Cannot read property 'scrollTo' of null
failure.stack-trace: Error: An unknown server-side error occurred while processing the command. at execute(<Function>) - index.js:316:3

test-case.name: User can make payment by Electronic Check
test-case.title: User can make payment by Electronic Check

label.name: feature
label.value: A registered user can pay by available Payment methods

step.name: user navigates to Make Payments page an selects payment method "Electronic Check"
step.title: user navigates to Make Payments page an selects payment method "Electronic Check"

step.name: user recieves payment successful message "You have successfully completed your Electronic Check Payment!"
step.title: user recieves payment successful message "You have successfully completed your Electronic Check Payment!"

step.name: user Account Summary is updated with the deficit amount after 10 seconds
step.title: user Account Summary is updated with the deficit amount after 10 seconds

test-case.name: User can make payment by Debit or Credit card
test-case.title: User can make payment by Debit or Credit card

label.name: feature
label.value: A registered user can pay by available Payment methods

step.name: user navigates to Make Payments page an selects payment method "Credit or Debit Card"
step.title: user navigates to Make Payments page an selects payment method "Credit or Debit Card"

step.name: user recieves payment successful message "You have successfully completed your Credit Card Payment!"
step.title: user recieves payment successful message "You have successfully completed your Credit Card Payment!"

step.name: user Account Summary is updated with the deficit amount after 10 seconds
